title: About Us
description:
factoryhunt.com is a free B2B website that helps manufacturers, suppliers, exporters, wholesalers and importers trade with each other. It is a hub for manufacturer & supplier listings. Factory Hunt is the easiest way to showcase products to potential business partners. Our mission is to make a simple, powerful services for suppliers and buyers, and make it easy to connect businesses. As a platform, we will continue to develop services to help businesses and discover new opportunities.

Best regards,

Factory Hunt Team
